Activity: Review and update any incomplete patient records in the EHR system. Coordinate with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 for missing data.
Attend a debrief session with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss any technical issues with EHR integration.
Test the new workflows in a sandbox environment provided by @ehrv-1. Report any bugs to @qatest-1 and @qatest-2.
Conduct a peer review session with @da-1 and @da-2 to ensure data accuracy and consistency in the EHR.
Document any workflow challenges and potential solutions. Share with @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1 for review.
Follow up with @helpdesk-1 regarding any user-reported issues with the EHR system.
